data.text: @eunice36anie Dear @eunice36anie, Please inbox(DM) us your claim number along with your email address and ticket number so that we can assist you. Regards,
@dionmar Dear @dionmar, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please let us know more of your case in a private message so that we can assist you.
@ladyndray Dear @ladyndray, We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please let us know more of your case in a private message so that we can assist you.
@dim_eme Dear @dim_eme,  Please let us know your intended travel date via private message so that we can a advice you the fare.Regards,

Ready To soar high and serve you the delicacies of our service as another beautiful day begins! Have a great week ahead!
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/jWBeAcASof

@katie_chi @Askyair Dear @katie_chi, we are really sorry for the inconvenience you had with your luggage. Kindly inbox us more details of your case along with your ticket number and email address so that we can assist you. Regards,

@Beejay072 Dear @Beejay072, We are very sorry to hear about the problem you had with your luggage.  Please inbox (DM) us your email address along with your baggage reference and ticket number so that we can assist you. Regards,

Ethiopian Airlines is ready to transport COVID-19 vaccine throughout the world,launching a new cold chain cargo transport equipped with simultaneous cabin temperature controlling system. #EthiopianAirlines #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/edYl53Krg5

We commemorated the 2nd anniversary of our flight commencement to Manchester. To mark the occasion, we surprised our two passengers with upgrades to Cloud Nine who won prize drawing at the check in.
 #flyethiopian https://t.co/YEvaA0jIBm

We are pleased to announce the resumption of our flight to Gondar effective 12 December, 2020. Book your flight with Ethiopian Mobile App and website. Fly with us and experience seamless and end-to-end service on your way to the “Camelot of Africa”. https://t.co/R2V8jkgcbU

"Our day to day activities leave us with instructive experience. All we have to do is to learn trying our best to strive to the highest accomplishments as much as we can."
First officer Kalkidan Kefu Ethiopian Airlines A350 co pilot
#EthiopianAirlines https://t.co/JiQGwDahz0

Ethiopian Airlines has been given a special recognition on the Cameroon Corporate Awards held in Douala Cameroon.The recognition was given for an consistent & outstanding performance in the Cameroon market & for an exceptional service during the COVID-19 pandemic.#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/VfrSReSDE1
